Usage: anyrepo clone [OPTIONS] URL

  Create a git clone, initialize AnyRepo workspace and create all dependent
  git clones.

Options:
  -M, --manifest FILE  Manifest file. 'anyrepo.toml' by default.
  -G, --groups TEXT    Group Filtering. TODO: more details. The setting
                       becomes default for all successive runs.
  -U, --update         Run 'anyrepo update' too.
  -h, --help           Show this message and exit.
